name: Borealis
author: anonymous867
description:
A
 tiny little palette based on a similar palette I put together back in 
'18 (my oldest pixel art palette, in fact, which was never shared on 
this website.) designed not only to be as multi-purpose as possible, but
 as a way of telling the user-base of LoSpec.com (including myself) to 
get out and experience the natural world (I'm into hiking and camping 
and all that!) The colors were inspired by pine trees, cliff faces, and,
 as the name suggests, the Aurora.
